verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When I was just a little child

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Higher than your knees

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My mother bought a box of crayons

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Just for me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I pick it up and open up

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: And look way down inside

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: And the colors reminded me of

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Jesus when He died.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Red is the color of the blood that He shed

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Brown is for the crown that they laid upon His head

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Blue is for the royalty within Him that dwells

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: And yellow is for the Christian who is afraid to tell

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Black is the color of the sins that we did

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: White is the color of our hearts when He forgives

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Green is for the creation that someday will be dissolved

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: 'Cause we're looking for the city which has streets of gold.

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: I colored and I colored

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: 'til the crayons were all gone.

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: And I hope someday

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: those little children will understand.
